en: :[face=250,Prof_Charme,300;name=Prof. Charme]:I would like to give you a package containing a very special item, which I am expecting to receive today.\nlSo start by writing down your first task: go and see if I've received the package in my mailbox.\nlThis is very important !
fr: :[face=250,Prof_Charme,300;name=Prof. Charme]:J’aimerais te remettre un colis contenant un objet très spécial, je dois justement le recevoir aujourd’hui.\nlCommence donc par écrire ta première tâche : aller voir si j'ai reçu le colis dans ma boîte aux lettres.\nlC'est très important !
es: :[face=250,Prof_Charme,300;name=Prof. Charme]:Me gustaría entregarte un paquete que contiene un objeto muy especial, lo recibiré hoy mismo.\nlEmpieza por escribir tu primera tarea: ir a ver si he recibido el paquete en mi buzón.\nl¡ Es muy importante !

en: :[face=250,Prof_Charme,300;name=Prof. Charme]:Talk to as many people as possible, interact with as many objects as possible, and explore every nook and cranny so \nlyou don't miss a thing in this wonderful adventure that awaits you !

en: :[face=250,Prof_Charme,300;name=Prof. Charme]:That said, you should go to Grandmother's house. \nlShe lives in one of the houses in the village.

en: :[face=250,Prof_Charme,300;name=Prof. Charme]:Just look for his name on the mailboxes.

es: :[face=250,Prof_Charme,300;name=Prof. Charme]:Solo tienes que buscar su nombre en los buzones.
it: :[face=250,Prof_Charme,300;name=Prof. Charme]:Basta cercare il suo nome sulle cassette postali.

en: :[face=250,Prof_Charme,300;name=Prof. Charme]:I don't know how my mail ended up there[WAIT 10].[WAIT 10].[WAIT 10].[WAIT 10]\nAnyway, could you please go check it out ?

es: :[face=250,Prof_Charme,300;name=Prof. Charme]:No sé cómo ha llegado mi correo allí[WAIT 10].[WAIT 10].[WAIT 10].[WAIT 10]\nEn fin, ¿ podrías ir a ver, por favor ?
it: :[face=250,Prof_Charme,300;name=Prof. Charme]:Non so come mai la mia posta sia finita lì [WAIT 10].[WAIT 10].[WAIT 10].[WAIT 10]\nlComunque, potresti andare a controllare, per favore?

en: :[face=250,Prof_Charme,300;name=Prof. Charme]:My mailbox isn't locked, you can go check it out.

en: :[face=250,Prof_Charme,300;name=Prof. Charme]:You found it ! \nlThank you so much ! \nlWell, here you go :

:[face=250,Prof_Charme,300;name=Prof. Charme]:Thanks to the Pokédex, every time you see a new\c[2]Pokemon\c[0] we'll collect data 
lon it. 
lFascinating, isn't it ?!
lNow that you have the Pokédex, catch as many \c[2]Pokemon\c[0] as possible to help me with my research.

:[face=250,Prof_Charme,300;name=Prof. Charme]:Grâce au Pokédex, à chaque fois que tu verras un nouveau \c[2]Pokemon\c[0] on récoltera des données 
ldessus. 
lFascinant n'est ce pas ?!
lMaintenant que tu as le Pokédex, attrape le plus de \c[2]Pokemon\c[0] possible, afin de m'aider dans mes recherches.
es:
:[face=250,Prof_Charme,300;name=Prof. Charme]:Gracias a la Pokédex, cada vez que veas un nuevo\c[2]Pokemon\c[0] recopilaremos datos

it: :[face=250,Prof_Charme,300;name=Prof. Charme]:Grazie al Pokédex, ogni volta che vedrai un nuovo\c[2]Pokemon\c[0] raccoglieremo dati su \nlAffascinante, vero ?! \nlOra che hai il Pokédex, cattura più \c[2]Pokemon\c[0] possibile, per aiutarmi nella mia ricerca.

en:
:[face=250,Prof_Charme,300;name=Prof. Charme]:But before you leave, I'd like you to go catch a\c[2]Pokemon\c[0] for Grandma.
lShe must be sad that my package was taken back. 
lIf I remember correctly, she loves \c[2]Sapereau\c[0].
lPlus, it'll give you a chance to relearn how to capture\c[2]Pokemon\c[0] and complete my Pokedex ! Hehe !
fr:
:[face=250,Prof_Charme,300;name=Prof. Charme]:Mais avant que tu ne partes, j'aimerais que tu ailles capturer un \c[2]Pokemon\c[0] pour Mère-Grand.
lElle doit être triste qu'on lui ait repris mon colis. 
lSi je me souviens bien, elle adore les \c[2]Sapereau\c[0].
lDe plus, ça te permettra de réapprendre à capturer des \c[2]Pokemon\c[0] ainsi que de compléter mon Pokedex ! Hé hé !
es:
:[face=250,Prof_Charme,300;name=Prof. Charme]:Pero antes de que te vayas, me gustaría que fueras a capturar un\c[2]Pokemon\c[0] para la abuela.
lDebe de estar triste porque le han quitado mi paquete.  
lSi no recuerdo mal, le encantan los \c[2]Sapereau\c[0].
lAdemás, ¡así volverás a aprender a capturar  \c[2]Pokemon\c[0] y completarás mi Pokédex! ¡ Je, je !
it:
:[face=250,Prof_Charme,300;name=Prof. Charme]:Ma prima che tu parta, vorrei che andassi a catturare un\c[2]Pokemon\c[0] per la nonna.
lDeve essere triste perché le hanno ritirato il mio pacco. 
lSe ricordo bene, adora i \c[2]Sapereau\c[0].
lInoltre, questo ti permetterà di imparare di nuovo a catturare i \c[2]Pokemon\c[0] e di completare il mio Pokedex ! Eh eh !

en: :[face=250,Prof_Charme,300;name=Prof. Charme]:Anyway, a friend of Grandma's lives on Route 1, and she's crazy about catching \c[2]Pokemon\c[0]. \nlHer name is Gertrude, you should go see her !
fr: :[face=250,Prof_Charme,300;name=Prof. Charme]:Enfin bon, une amie de Mère-Grand se trouve sur la route 1, elle est fada de la capture de \c[2]Pokemon\c[0]. \nlElle s’appelle Gertrude, tu devrais aller la voir !
es: :[face=250,Prof_Charme,300;name=Prof. Charme]:Bueno, una amiga de la abuela está en la carretera 1, le encanta capturar \c[2]Pokémon\c[0]. \nlSe llama Gertrude, ¡ deberías ir a verla !
it: :[face=250,Prof_Charme,300;name=Prof. Charme]:Comunque, una amica di Nonna Grande si trova sulla strada 1, è pazza per la cattura dei \c[2]Pokemon\c[0]. \nlSi chiama Gertrude, dovresti andare a trovarla !

en: :[face=250,Prof_Charme,300;name=Prof. Charme]:Go check at Grandmother's house to see if my package is there.\nlShe lives in one of the houses in Bourg-Guignon. \nlLook for her name on the mailboxes, you'll find it eventually.
fr: :[face=250,Prof_Charme,300;name=Prof. Charme]:Va voir chez Mère-Grand s' il y a mon colis.\nlElle se trouve dans l’une des maisons de Bourg-Guignon. \nlCherche son nom sur les boîtes aux lettres, tu vas bien finir par trouver.
es: :[face=250,Prof_Charme,300;name=Prof. Charme]:Ve a ver si mi paquete está en casa de la abuela.\nlElla vive en una de las casas de Bourg-Guignon. \nlBusca su nombre en los buzones, al final lo encontrarás.
it: :[face=250,Prof_Charme,300;name=Prof. Charme]:Vai da Nonna a vedere se c'è il mio pacco. \nlSi trova in una delle case di Bourg-Guignon. \nlCerca il suo nome sulle cassette delle lettere, alla fine lo troverai.

en: :[name=Tiitoonz Poketoonz]:As you all know, significant changes have been spreading across the world for many years now... /nlBut the changes in nature are just the tip of the iceberg ! /nlAccording to my research, everything that the \c[2]legendary Pokemon\c[0] have established up until now is being disrupted.
fr:
:[name=Tiitoonz Poketoonz]:Comme vous le savez tous, des changements conséquents se propagent à travers le monde 
ldepuis maintenant de nombreuses années... 
lMais les changements de la nature ne sont que la surface immergée de l'iceberg ! 
lD'après mes recherches, toutes les choses que les \c[2]Pokemon légendaires\c[0] ont mis en place jusqu’à présent sont bouleversées[WAIT 10].[WAIT 10].[WAIT 10].[WAIT 10]
es: :[name=Tiitoonz Poketoonz]:Como todos sabéis, desde hace muchos años se están produciendo cambios importantes en todo el mundo... \n¡ Pero los cambios en la naturaleza son solo la punta del iceberg. \nSegún mis investigaciones, todo lo que los \c[2]Pokémon legendarios\c[0] han construido hasta ahora se está viendo trastocado[WAIT 10].[WAIT 10].[WAIT 10].[WAIT 10]

en:
:[name=Tiitoonz Poketoonz]:Whether it be space and time, human emotions, dreams, the atmosphere[WAIT 10]. [WAIT 10].[WAIT 10].[WAIT 10] EVERYTHING !
lNow, only Bombance remains untouched. 
lWhy ours ? 
lHere is a legend we found in the Archaic cave.
fr:
:[name=Tiitoonz Poketoonz]:Que ce soit l'espace et le temps, les émotions par les être humains, les rêves, l'atmosphère[WAIT 10].[WAIT 10].[WAIT 10].[WAIT 10] TOUT !
lA présent, il ne reste que Bombance comme région intacte. 
lPourquoi la nôtre ? 
lVoici une légende que nous avons trouvé dans la grotte Archaïque.
es:
:[name=Tiitoonz Poketoonz]:Ya sea el espacio y el tiempo, las emociones de los seres humanos, los sueños, la atmósfera[WAIT 10]. [WAIT 10].[WAIT 10].[WAIT 10] ¡ TODO !
lAhora solo queda Bombance como región intacta. 
l¿ Por qué la nuestra ?

it:
:[name=Tiitoonz Poketoonz]:Che si tratti dello spazio e del tempo, delle emozioni degli esseri umani, dei sogni, dell'atmosfera[WAIT 10]. [WAIT 10].[WAIT 10].[WAIT 10] TUTTO !

en: :[name=Tiitoonz Poketoonz]::[align=center]:“When only one region remains and the four elemental artifacts : water, earth, fire, and air are /nlreunited, then the fifth element, which will either destroy or resurrect the world, will appear.”

I know you're just a beginner, but we need as many trainers as possible for this case. /nlAs the legend says, if these artifacts fall into the wrong hands, the world is in danger.

en:
:[name=Tiitoonz Poketoonz]:Help us find the artifacts !
lThe closest place to here is the enchanted forest. 
I know a woodcutter who has lived there for a long time... a very long time... you should ask him if he knows anything.
